alert.note: Alert for Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 30 at 7:16AM EDT until April 30 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL VOLUSIA COUNTY... At 716 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Osteen, or 7 miles east of Deltona, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Daytona Beach, Port Orange, New Smyrna Beach, Edgewater and South Daytona. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for east central Florida. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into a small central room in a sturdy structure.
